featured.text: As the climate became drier and colder, they retreated to a narrow strip along the Pacific coast of Northern California.
Intense, fast-moving fires raged across much of California last week.
Raised in California, Whitfield began performing in public at age 18, when she took a job as a singing waitress at a pizza parlor.
The hula hoop gained international popularity in the late 1950s, when a plastic version was successfully marketed by California’s Wham-O toy company.

definition.zh_def: 美國的一個州，位於西海岸，以其多樣的地理、氣候和文化而聞名。
definition.en_def: A state in the western United States known for its diverse geography, climate, and culture.
definition.example: California is famous for its beaches and entertainment industry.
